page.title: 15THE POPULATION,CANFORD MAGNA
page.content: The population of the area has increas -ed vastly over the last two decades. The new residents come from all parts of the country,drawn by the employment available in such places as Barclays International at Poole,& the many high -tech.& light industries which have grown up in Poole,Ferndown & surround- ing areas.The pleasant surroundings, mild climate & agreeable atmosphere have also attracted many retired people,so there is now a good mix of all ages.They are drawn predominantly from the middle classes.The l981 cen- sus figures roughly covering this are :-2636 households,3464 males & 3692 females.Age groups l752 under l6 years 42l4 l6-64 yrs,1328 over 65 years.The fact that only 373 households were without cars indicates the comparative prosperity of the area.There are few new Commonwealth residents.
